name: Tank Busters 3D (Old Prototype)
description:
Explore the small city, and knock out the enemy tanks!

Controls:

W = Move forward

S = Move backward

A = Turn left

D = Turn right

Space = Single Shoot

Shift = Special Shoot

Credits:

Concept and tank design by Riegel25.

Made with GameMaker 3rd Person View Engine by John Weeren.
